name: Awesome gateaway to Baalbek and Ksara Caves
description:
In the Beqaa valley, undulating in the
magnificent landscape open up the ancient city of Baalbek. 
Baalbek, Lebanon's greatest Roman treasure!  These are not only the
largest and most noble Roman temples ever built, but they are also among the
best preserved.
Continue to Ksara to taste the Lebanese wine and visit the Caves. Built during
the Roman period then covered by sand for centuries, the Ksara caves were found
by mistakes in 1898.
